dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3709613C] Re: Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Corporation Pro

-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Saturday, March 31, 2007 10:09 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3709613C] Re: Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Corporation Properties ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Sun, 1 Apr 2007 03:56:16 -0400 Received: from [192.168.1.101] ([68.5.209.222]) by fed1rmimpo02.cox.net with bizsmtp id hjwB1W00Q4oSg5Q0000000; Sun, 01 Apr 2007 03:56:16 -0400 In-Reply-To: <9BAF3CF4365C924EB65666F5A427F0450F0C42@kmw-exch01.kmw.local> References: <9BAF3CF4365C924EB65666F5A427F0450F0C42@kmw-exch01.kmw.local> Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2) Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-23--461802584 Message-Id: <7DD58390-7B17-467A-BFC4-3D239AFDF99B@wingclips.com> Cc: abuse@ev1servers.net, support@domainpeople.com, "Mikala K. Irion" , mikala@wingclips.com From: Mitch Irion X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Re: Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Corporation Properties Subject: Re: Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Corporation Properties Date: Sun, 1 Apr 2007 00:51:32 -0700 To: David Caplan , Larry Frenzel X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.2) X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: mitch@wingclips.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Apr 2007 07:56:34.0423 (UTC) FILETIME=[44783070:01C77433] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) David, This is to inform you that WingClips does have written permission from Paramount Pictures. Monday we can Fax a copy of our agreement for your records. Mitch On Mar 31, 2007, at 7:01 PM, David Caplan wrote: > David K. Caplan > Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP > 9720 Wilshire Blvd., Penthouse Suite > Beverly Hills, CA 90212 > U.S.A. > Tel: (310) 248-3830 > Fax: (310) 860-0363 > > March 31, 2007 > > > VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL > > Everyones Internet > 390 Benmar Suite 200 > Houston, Texas > 77060 > > abuse@ev1servers.net; mirion@creativewing.com; > support@domainpeople.com > > Re: Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Corporation > Properties > http://www.wingsclips.com > > To Whom It May Concern: > > This letter is being written to you on behalf of Paramount > Pictures Corporation (hereinafter "Paramount"). Paramount is the owner > of rights in and to the "Nacho Libre" "Charlotte's Web" and "World > Trade > Center" motion pictures (hereinafter collectively referred to as > "Paramount Properties"). No one is authorized to copy, reproduce, > distribute, or otherwise use the Paramount Properties without the > express written permission of Paramount. > > It has been brought to our attention that the website > located at > "http://www.wingsclips.com," for which you are the service > provider, is > distributing, displaying, and reproducing, unauthorized copies of the > Paramount Properties. The specific URLs from which these unauthorized > copies are being distributed, displayed and reproduced are: > > Nacho Libre > 1. http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=category&category_id=479 > 2. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=product&product_id=16185&category_i > d=479 > 3. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=product&product_id=16186&category_i > d=479 > 4. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=product&product_id=16184&category_i > d=479 > > World Trade Center > 1. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=search&substring=world+trade > +center > > 2. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=product&product_id=16241&substring= > world+trade+center > 3. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=product&product_id=16242&substring= > world+trade+center > > Charlotte's Web > 1. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=search&target=search&substring=char > lotte > 2. > http://wingclips.com/cart.php? > target=product&product_id=16239&substring= > charlotte > > Paramount has the good faith belief that the use of the material > in the manner complained of is not authorized by Paramount, its > agent or > the law. Paramount diligently enforces its rights in and to the > Paramount Properties in all forms of media. Our client rightfully > takes > its responsibility for the protection of the Paramount Properties very > seriously. > > As you may be aware, Internet Service Providers can be held > liable if they do not respond to claims of infringement pursuant to > the > requirements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and/or > international laws with similar effect. In accordance with the > DMCA, we > request your assistance in the removal of infringements of the > Paramount > Properties from this web site and any other sites for which you act as > an Internet Service Provider. We further declare under penalty of > perjury that we are authorized to act on behalf of Paramount and that > the information in this letter is accurate. > > Nothing contained in this letter constitutes an express or implied > waiver of any rights, remedies or defenses of Paramount, all of which > are expressly reserved. > > Very truly yours, > /s/ > David K. Caplan > Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP > > DKC:vf > cc: Paramount Pictures Corporation > > ï¿¼ Mitch Irion I President I WingClips I 27001 Paseo Activo I San Juan Capistrano I CA 92675 I 949-489-0083 I FAX 949-489-0558 This message is for the designated recipient only and may contain privileged or confidential information. If you have received it in error, please notify the sender immediately and delete the original. Any other use of this email by you is prohibited. WingClips and TrailerClips are trademarks of WingClips LLC. (multipart/mixed) MIME element (text/html) David,

This is to inform you that WingClips does have written permission from Paramount Pictures.
Monday we can Fax a copy of our agreement for your records.

Mitch
